name: Happily Ever After (itch) (Snoopydoo)
description:
The hero has just saved the day. Now there's no more epic quests to go on and no more monsters to fight. Now he struggles to try to live a normal life.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. The theme was: "An end is a new beginning." It was my first game jam.

You may play the game in your browser, but downloading is recommended.

Press F4 to toggle fullscreen. This game can be played with the keyboard or a game controller. It can technically also be controlled with a mouse or touch screen, but that's a bit glitchy.

Controls (keyboard):

Move/Navigate Menus: Arrow Keys

Interact/Confirm: Z / Enter / Space

Cancel: X / Esc

Menu: X / Esc

Dash: Shift

Controls (Xbox controller):

Move: Left Stick / D-Pad

Interact/Confirm: A

Cancel: B

Menu: Y / Start

Dash: X
